Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone. I was just thinking about KSP last night and the Apollo 11 launch, and how it got so much publicity, being the first Moon landing, of course, and I was thinking... 'What if there was a news outlet on Kerbin, like a radio station or a newspaper, documenting all new records, like landing on the Mun, altitude records, etc.? That would be rather interesting...'

So I was thinking of The Kerbin News, a news outlet that starts as a newspaper, and asks you to make a relay network to expand it into a TV/radio station to get a higher number of viewers to increase rep (viewers), funds (running the network), and science (made first relay network), and maybe, just maybe, we could have a reason to launch a satellite network to broadcast TV/radio.

Then again, just a few of my thoughts...

What do you guys think about it?

Have a good day!

-KierBear44

Considering the difficulty of the game, it would give a sense of fulfillment to players. Especially those who are not exactly scientists and have trouble achieving orbit or going to the Mun : a cutscene could be a nice stimulation to persist and try to go further.

Should be considered with low priority, though. The game still needs more important things, such as eradication of bugs and improvements to the interface.
